title: Ep 292 How To Become Rich
itunes:title: How To Become Rich
description:
Frank interviews personal finance expert and author Farnoosh Torabi.  She talks about the best way for retirees to generate income, the easiest way to lower your debt and how young investors could become rich using these simple money saving techniques.
 
Frank then pays tribute to Jim Cramer, who is celebrating his 10-year anniversary as host of CNBC's Mad Money.  In his educational segment, Frank also shares one of his favorite healthcare picks.  It's a stock rarely mentioned in mainstream media and had huge upside potential.
